Key Match Events: Charith Asalanka scored 59 runs off 35 balls.
Kamindu Mendis scored 51 runs from 40 balls.
Kusal Mendis added a quick 19 runs.
Romario Shepherd took two wickets for 39 runs.
Gudakesh Motie and Shamar Springer each took one wicket.
Brandon King scored 63 runs off 33 balls.
Evin Lewis scored 50 runs from 28 deliveries.
Matheesha Pathirana took two wickets for 27 runs in 3.1 overs.
Kamindu Mendis and Maheesh Theekshana each took one wicket.
Pre-Game Insights: The 2nd T20I of the West Indies tour of Sri Lanka 2024 will be held at the Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium, Dambulla on Tuesday, 15 October 2024.
The West Indies currently lead the series 1-0.
Historically, the two teams have been evenly matched in their last ten encounters, with the West Indies securing six victories while Sri Lanka has claimed four.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be held at Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium, famous for its fast and bouncy pitch that benefits pace bowlers.
The weather in Dambulla is forecasted to be overcast, with a temperature of 29°C and humidity levels at 82%. There is a considerable 60% chance of rain, which may affect the match.
